mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( review_id, content, review_score, member_id, item_id ) VALUES ( #{reviewId}, #{content}, #{reviewScore}, #{memberId}, #{itemId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET member_id = #{memberId}, item_id = #{itemId}, content = #{content}, review_score=#{reviewScore}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
